alert.note: Alert for Hawaii in Hawaii (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 19 at 4:31PM HST until December 19 at 5:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM HST FOR HAWAII IN HAWAII COUNTY... At 427 PM HST, a line of severe thunderstorms extended from near Waimea to Puuanahulu to 15 miles southwest of Kailua-Kona, moving east-northeast at 70 mph. At 415 pm, the Kona Airport reported a wind gust of 56 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to roofs and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Kailua-Kona, Paauilo, Waipio Valley, Puuanahulu, Kamuela, Honokaa, Waikoloa Village, Laupahoehoe, Ookala, Kohala Ranch, Kalaoa and Waimanu Valley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
